name: Kettlebell Core Exercises Library
description: A reference library of kettlebell core exercises from @powerbrutehq. Russian twists, windmills, halos, side bends, and swings. No specific reps — use as a menu to pick from for your core work.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Russian Twist
exercises.description: Sit, knees bent, lean back, rotate torso side to side touching KB to ground.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Windmill
exercises.description: KB overhead in one hand, hinge at hips and bend to opposite side.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Halo
exercises.description: Circle KB around head, elbows high.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Side Bend
exercises.description: KB in one hand, bend sideways, return.

raw.caption: Kettlebell core exercises library! Here are some core exercises you can add to your routine.
raw.visualSummary: Muscular man in gym demonstrates a fast-paced montage of kettlebell core exercises — twisting, bending, swinging, and overhead movements.

uncertainties: Exercises inferred from visuals and common KB core moves
No reps or structure provided — this is a reference library
